Name: emg2qwerty: A Large Dataset with Baselines for Touch Typing using Surface Electromyography
Acknowledgements: Data collected by Meta Reality Labs CTRL-labs. BIDS conversion was done at SCCN, INC, UCSD.
HowToAcknowledge: Please cite: Sivakumar, V., Seely, J., Du, A., Bittner, S.R., Berenzweig, A., Bolarinwa, A., Gramfort, A., & Mandel, M.I. (2024). emg2qwerty: A Large Dataset with Baselines for Touch Typing using Surface Electromyography. arXiv:2410.20081. https://github.com/facebookresearch/emg2qwerty
EthicsApprovals: Approved by an independent external Institutional Review Board (IRB). Participation was voluntary, participants provided informed consent, and data have been de-identified.
